page.title: 01Introduction to area.
page.content: Our area may be divided into two main categories.One half is heavily built up with mainly terraced properties and industrial units,while the other half is mainly farm land. There is also a large R.A.F.site (16-M.U.)in our area,which is a supply and service unit for other R.A.F.bases. There is a County Showground used for many different exhibitions and displays,and a piece of "common land"which is used by fairs and circuses. There are two very well known factories,Lotus Shoes,and Evode Adhesives Works as well as many other industrial units.
